name: Pinball Arcade: Season One Pro Pack
detailed_description:
The Season One Pro Pack includes all of tables and extra content released through Table Pack 10 for a greatly discounted price!

This includes the pinball tables Theatre of Magic™, Black Hole™, Ripley's Believe It or Not!®, Medieval Madness™, Bride of Pin•Bot™, Cirqus Voltaire™, Funhouse™, Monster Bash™, Gorgar™, Creature from the Black Lagoon®, Black Knight™, Harley-Davidson® 3rd Edition, Taxi™, Elvira and the Party Monsters™, No Good Gofers™, Scared Stiff™, Big Shot™, Twilight Zone®, Star Trek: The Next Generation®, Attack From Mars™, and Genie™ along with access to the Pro Menu of Medieval Madness, Scared Stiff, Twilight Zone, Attack From Mars and Star Trek: The Next Generation.

This pack also unlocks the Twilight Zone, Star Trek: The Next Generation, and Season One custom balls.
about_the_game:
The Season One Pro Pack includes all of tables and extra content released through Table Pack 10 for a greatly discounted price!

This includes the pinball tables Theatre of Magic™, Black Hole™, Ripley's Believe It or Not!®, Medieval Madness™, Bride of Pin•Bot™, Cirqus Voltaire™, Funhouse™, Monster Bash™, Gorgar™, Creature from the Black Lagoon®, Black Knight™, Harley-Davidson® 3rd Edition, Taxi™, Elvira and the Party Monsters™, No Good Gofers™, Scared Stiff™, Big Shot™, Twilight Zone®, Star Trek: The Next Generation®, Attack From Mars™, and Genie™ along with access to the Pro Menu of Medieval Madness, Scared Stiff, Twilight Zone, Attack From Mars and Star Trek: The Next Generation.

This pack also unlocks the Twilight Zone, Star Trek: The Next Generation, and Season One custom balls.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 ghz or better.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card.
